channel.title: RuneMix - 24/7, PK, Skill, Economy
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://www.runemix.com"][img]http://i.imgur.com/nYsFlHd.png[/img][/URL]
[B]Website[/B]: [URL=http://"http://www.runemix.com"]RuneMix.com[/URL]
[B]Description[/B]: What is RuneMix? RuneMix is a recreation of RS, with unique features. At RM you will find a friendly staff and community, all working skills, a great combat system and much more. The economy is perfect, you will not see people running around with huge amounts of gold nor rares. Updates are consistent, always free for everyone.
[B]Images[/B]:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/AEkhhfs.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JtWpmuG.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HgM25ie.png[/img] [/CENTER]
